verbs.description: [ARG1: records] [V: set] [ARGM-TMP: during pittsburgh steelers 41 - 17 win over falcons] the pittsburgh steelers got back on track with a 41 - 17 victory over the atlanta falcons with the win the steelers improved to 2 - 2 - 1 while also recording their first victory terry bradshaw pittsburgh national football league james conner pittsburgh steelers arizona cardinals atlanta falcons chuck noll pro football hall of fame green bay packers antonio brown jim brown ben rothwell falcons nfl mike tomlin nfl hall of fame big ben ben roethlisberger aaron rodgers heinz field steelers
